text: Of Love and Shadows, also known as De amor y de sombra, is a 1994 Chilean Argentine American romantic drama movie directed by Betty Kaplan and based on the 1984 novel of the same name by Isabel Allende. It stars Antonio Banderas, Jennifer Connelly, Stefania Sandrelli, Patricio Contreras, Jorge Rivera LÃ³pez and was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * Category:1994 romantic drama movies Category:Chilean movies Category:Argentine romance movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies set in Argentina Category:Movies set in Chile
title: Of Love and Shadows
